H1.text: when tupac was shot. Las Vegas, September 7, 1996

H2.text: when tupac was shot. Quad Studios shooting, 1994

H3.text: when tupac was shot. Tupac 1994 assault

A4.text: On September 7, 1996, Shakur was shot four times by an unidentified assailant in a drive-by shooting in Paradise, Nevada; he died six days later.

A5.text: Shakur had a falling out with B.I.G. after Shakur was shot at Quad Studios in 1994.
